thread.title: A Magnificent Brahma Rooster Struts His Gorgeously Feathered Self Around the Yard
thread.title_full: A Magnificent Brahma Rooster Struts His Gorgeously Feathered Self Around the Yard

author: Lori Dorn
title: A Magnificent Brahma Rooster Struts His Gorgeously Feathered Self Around the Yard
text:
A giant Brahma rooster squeezed out of the hen house, stretched out in the morning sunshine and proudly strutted around the yard , showing off his gorgeously feathered self. The rooster’s human James stated that “(translated) it’s a rooster’s world”, which appears valid in this scenario as James found a different Brahma rooster on the other side of the yard doing exactly the same thing .

via reddit
